name: The Maze (OrbitNinja)
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Can you escape the deadly maze? 

Waking up in the middle of the night in an unknown place, you must try and find a way out of the maze. 

You must explore the maze and find clues in order to perform a ritual to open the gates to freedom.  

FEATURES

  • 4 types of monsters to be wary of
  • Notes around the map that has lore about the maze
  • 4 different small locations you can explore in one single map
  • Collecting stuff (You have to find them)
  • A flashlight! 
  • A maze to go through 
  • And maybe more stuff in the future

*Currently all you can do is walk around and explore a bit*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After many hours of learning unity and hands on practice, this game is a game idea I had that I wanted to make and have fun with. 

Most of the assets were made by me. A few assets are from the unity assets store though.

Game is currently in development so feel free to leave any comments.
